mapper.insert: INSERT INTO github_push_event ( delivery_id, repository_name, ref, head_commit_sha, author_login, author_email, commit_message, files_json, raw_payload, status, failure_reason, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{deliveryId}, #{repositoryName}, #{reference}, #{headCommitSha}, #{authorLogin}, #{authorEmail}, #{commitMessage}, #{filesJson}, #{rawPayload}, #{status}, #{failureReason}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, delivery_id, repository_name, ref, head_commit_sha, author_login, author_email, commit_message, files_json, raw_payload, status, failure_reason, created_at, updated_at FROM github_push_event WHERE delivery_id = #{deliveryId}

SELECT id, delivery_id, repository_name, ref, head_commit_sha, author_login, author_email, commit_message, files_json, raw_payload, status, failure_reason, created_at, updated_at FROM github_push_event WHERE status = 'QUEUED' ORDER BY id LIMIT 1
